description.p: The ELTRUN Wireless Research Center (ELTRUN/WRC) operates under the direction and supervision of Dr George M. Giaglis and pursues basic and applied research on areas relating to the application and exploitation of mobile and wireless technologies in organizational and social contexts. The main research interests of the group engage upon the following research streams:

ul.li: Mobile Business Strategy, Policy and Regulation

description.p: The mission of ELTRUN/WRC is to promote research on mobile and wireless business through its participation on leading-edge and innovative research projects as well as the production of high-quality research results. The members of ELTRUN/WRC pursue basic and applied interdisciplinary research on a multiplicity of dimensions defining the world of mobile and wireless business.
